::DrillBit::

DrillBit knew what she was saying. If he did this, she would not
remember what they had.
"No, there is another way. I can surgically alter your memory cirquits.
I could make it so you forget the inncodent with Land Mine, but nothing
els. I did this procedure on cybertron. I used to run a clinic."
